documentation.author: Steve Wade
documentation.purpose:
This rule evokes when the Rescind Baker Act order is signed or the Baker Act Standards order is Completed, Discontinued, Cancelled, Cancel D/C or Deleted.
If Rescind Baker Act order is signed and there is an existing Baker Act Standards order in Ordered status Complete all Baker Act Standards orders. If Rescind Baker Act order is signed or Baker Act Standards order is Completed, Discontinued, Cancelled, Cancel D/C or Deleted and there is a Nurse to Dietary Communication order in Ordered status, the Nurse to Dietary Communication order gets completed. If Rescind Baker Act order is signed or Baker Act Standards order is Completed, Discontinued, Cancelled, Cancel D/C or Deleted and there is a Consult to Psych MD order in Ordered status, the Consult to Psych MD order gets cancelled. If Rescind Baker Act order is signed or Baker Act Standards order is Completed, Discontinued, Cancelled, Cancel D/C or Deleted and there is a Baker Act Safety Check order in Ordered status, the Baker Act Safety Check order gets completed. If Rescind Baker Act order is signed or Baker Act Standards order is Completed, Discontinued, Cancelled, Cancel D/C or Deleted and there is a Consult to Social Services Psych order in Ordered status, the Consult to Social Services Psych order gets completed.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_ACTION_DETAIL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with action of ORDER_ACTION and order detail OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_INCOMING_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains an order ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS whose ordering physician OPT_QUALIFIER in OPT_ORDDOC and OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_DETAIL_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST

statements.statement: select if (par1 ="OTHER") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.name_full_formatted not between "0*" and "Z*" and pl.active_ind = 1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 elseif (par1="ALL") from prsnl pl where pl.name_full_formatted != " " and pl.active_ind=1 and pl.physician_ind = 1 else from prsnl pl where pl.physician_ind = 1 and pl.active_ind=1 and cnvtupper(pl.name_full_formatted)=patstring(concat(substring(1,1,par1),"*")) endif pl.name_full_formatted, _hidden=pl.person_id order name_full_formatted

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_ACTION_INC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with action of ORDER_ACTION and order detail OPT_ORDER_DETAIL OPT_QUALIFIER OPT_LIST1 and OPT_LIST2

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the order detail ORDER_DETAIL QUALIFIER LIST for any order(s) in LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_PARENT_CHILD_L
templateDefinitions.definition: CONTINUING_TYPE PARENT_CHILD orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SETUP_UPDATE_ORDERS_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Setup GROUP_NAME with ACTION_TYPE orders for QUAL in LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Prepare modify/cancel actions to be sent to the Order Server

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALL_ORDER_SERVER_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Call order server with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT
templateDefinitions.description: Send orders and actions from prior templates to the Order Server

values.value: Baker Act Safety Check Upon Transfer

value.value: System generated Complete as a result of @CATALOGCDDISP:2.
